title: Amenities. Lakeside Location. Sophisticated Style. Harbor Crest Euclid
app_fee: $35 app fee per adult for credit, rental history, and criminal background checks
posting_body: Living at Harbor Crest On The Lake Is Like Living On a Vacation Resort!!
I currently have 2 bedrooms 1 bath available in June.
Our 2-bedroom 1- bath suite are $840.
The unit I have in mind for you has: a newer bathroom vanity, carpet, newer appliances, and large balcony to enjoy the sights and sounds of Lake Erie.
Wake up to spectacular views of gorgeous sunrises and say good night to brilliant sunsets over Lake Erie.
Along with an amazing list of community amenities, we also offer the added convenience of online rental payment and maintenance requests.
Visit Harbor Crest and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!
We understand how tedious the moving process can be and we are dedicated to making it as smooth as possible for you.
Feel free to log onto <URL> and view our floor plans, take a virtual tour, and even use the furniture arranger to see how beautiful your furniture will look in suite unit number.
It only takes 2 minutes!
Go to <URL> to see what Harbor Crest has to offer, please call today if you have any questions.
Community Amenities
• Brand New State-of-the- Art Fitness Center
• Sparkling Outdoor Pool
• Heated Indoor Pool
• Two Party Rooms
• All New Common Area Upgrades Including Carpeting and Lighting
• Laundry Facility in Each Building
• Customer Service Office Offering Package Acceptance, Fax and Copy Machines
• Underground Garage Parking Available
• Near Public Transportation
• Easy Access to Local Freeways
• On-Site Management
• On-Site Maintenance
• Controlled Building Access
• 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance
• Online Rental Payments and Maintenance Requests
• Preferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available
